welcome_message_body: Welcome to Quilicura, Chile! Known for its picturesque landscapes and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore our charming city and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here.

restaurants.name: Pasteleria Sacher
restaurants.description: Pasteleria Sacher is a bakery located in Huechuraba.
restaurants.address: Pedro Fontova 6277, Huechuraba, Metropolitana de Santiago de Chile

restaurants.name: Chama's valle grande
restaurants.description: Chama's valle grande is a pizzeria located in the city.

restaurants.name: Donde Rey

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Arturo Merino Benitez Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights operated by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
